CustomField.formula: CASE(Type,"Production Update 1","April 1", "Production Update 2",IF(TEXT(Marca__c)="DONMARIO","June 1","August 1"), "Production Update 3",IF(TEXT(Marca__c)="DONMARIO","July 1","December 1"), "Production Update 4","August 1","Production Update 5","December 1", "Final Production Report","April 2", "Sales Forecast Update 1","December 1", "Sales Forecast Update 2","April 2","Sales Forecast Update 3","June 2","Sales Forecast Update 4","July 2","Final Sales Report","August 2","Not Report")
CustomField.label: Report Month
